items.question: How often should I train to see results?
items.answer: For most people, 3-4 workouts per week are enough to see progress. Consistency is more important than frequency. We'll adapt the frequency based on your goals and schedule.

items.question: How do online workouts work?
items.answer: You'll receive a personalized monthly program via WhatsApp, with demo videos for each exercise. You can send recordings of your executions for feedback and adjustments.

items.question: Do I need to use supplements to get results?
items.answer: It's not mandatory, most results come from consistent training and adequate nutrition. However, certain supplements can help depending on goals. We'll discuss options if you're interested, but they're not essential.

items.question: How long does it take to see results?
items.answer: Most clients notice changes in the first 2-4 weeks, especially in energy levels and strength. Visible body transformations usually appear after 6-8 weeks of consistency in training and nutrition.

items.question: Does the nutrition plan include recipes?
items.answer: Yes, the nutrition plan includes meal examples, simple recipes and ingredient alternative lists, so you can adapt the plan to your culinary preferences and available meal prep time.
